FuncDef: A 16 bit CRC can only be configured on an OC-3 channel, all other channel speeds must use a 32 bit CRC except for the paths configured with encap-type atm at OC3 speed.

ParaDef.Info: Use 16 bit checksum for the associated port/channel.
Use 32 bit checksum for the associated port/channel.

ExtraInfo:
Default: crc 16 for OC-3, DS-1, DS-3
crc 32 for OC-12, OC-48, ATM-OC12/3, AT-MOC-3, and so onNote: The CRC default is 32 when the encap-type is set to ATM and also, the default cannot be changed when the encap-type is set to ATM.
